definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Canda has made some secret business deal with China in exchange for sending this man back home.
sentences.chinese: 把这人送回国去，是加拿大跟中国私底下有交易。

sentences.english: so I knew him both personally and I knew him professionally.
sentences.chinese: 我们在私底下以及工作上都比较了解。

sentences.english: The only sneakers I wear multiple times are the ones I wear on stage.
sentences.chinese: 我在私底下穿的板鞋都是在舞台表演用的。

sentences.english: This section was also jarring because it primarily consisted of backdoor brags.
sentences.chinese: 这部分也不和谐，因为它包含私底下自夸的成分。

sentences.english: Of course, I would give that amount to my brothers on the Stunt Team in private.
sentences.chinese: 当然我私底下会给他们相同数目的奖金。

sentences.english: Zhao Fu privately appealed to zhao mother, also cannot too spoiled child.
sentences.chinese: 赵父私底下也劝解赵母，不能过于宠爱孩子。

sentences.english: In his personal life, Lloyd Webber is a happily-married family man.
sentences.chinese: 私底下，韦伯是个快乐的已婚男人。

sentences.english: Off the record, I hate our boss's guts .
sentences.chinese: 私底下跟你说，我恨死我们老板了。

sentences.english: The following story is about a sweet-heart sweetheart deal which I made last week.
sentences.chinese: 下面的故事就是有关我上周私底下做的一个交易。
私底下，我暗暗与她较劲。

sentences.english: He prefers to do the "stubbed toe dance" in private.
sentences.chinese: 他私底下喜欢跳“扭断脚趾的舞”。

sentences.english: It seems essential that those actions must be performable in private too.
sentences.chinese: 很重要的一个前提，是我们能在私底下进行这些行为。

definition: always (previously)/a period of time in the recent past
lit. eyes and eyebrows come and go (idiom); to make eyes/to exchange flirting glances with sb
cannot bear to see/to hate/to dislike/to disapprove
